review:
She can be a great doctor with many “feathers on her cap” *** ** *** *** *** **** **** ** *** ********  *** ** *** ** ** ** ***.
Every time we paid for consultation, but she didn’t listen to our problem and went out somewhere to attend any phone call and left everything on her assistant doctors *** *** **** **** *** ****** ********* **** **** *** **** *** ********* ** **** ** ****** **** *** ** ** **

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Sorry but my visit to doctor was not satisfied  after a long wait of ultra sound report she  didn't explain the problem properly and just suggested surgery  and left for seminar but yes I would like to mention she  did my pep smearing sampling test nicely and made me comfortable I'm not  from delhi came from Rajasthan  but i couldn't get satisfactory result  * **** **** *** **** *** **** ** *** ******* ***** **** **** ** ****** ** ** **** **** **** ** ******* ** ** *** **** ***** ******* *** *******  ********** *** ** ****** ***

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I visited this doctor for the first time and assistant Gunjan said Dr malvika is not available in the clinic even in the time slot as given by her on the call when we tried to explain the conversation she said you do not remember the right communication that has happened and now you can consult her daughter in law Dr Shivani sabrwal . But Dr malvika is sitting in front of me and I complained at reception so then the receptionist called gunjan directly and as per the conversation Dr is sitting in the clinic and now go and consult her another assistant Ruby .

This was my first visit and as the experience it was the very bad and would never recommend it to any other person in life. They are forcing people to connect with her daughter in law (DR Shivani sabrwal). **** *** **** ***** ***** **** *** ****** ****** ** ****** **************** ****** ****** *** ******** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My sister has just delivered her baby in this apollo spectra hospital , she was consulting malvika sabharwal and shivani sabharwal , when her water bag busted and waited for 8 hours for the doctors  and she had a c- section delivery each and every steps and processes were orally discussed in the ot , there is no professionalism, then now when her stiches got cut she left one thread which was extremely painful for my sister she went again to get it removed. ** **** *** ***** **** ****** *** highly unsatisfactory services .Think twice before consulting here.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,

review: I had one of the really bad  experience with the doctor, she not at all explained the issue, ** ***************, she was on her phone *** *** **** *** ****** *** **** *** ** *** I had to wait for more than 2 hours both the times I visited her even after appointment, will never recommend to anyone ever.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Thank you dr.malvika for your gud care and concern.. your manner'put me at Ease and helped me Gain confidence bcz of you I'm doing very well.. thank you for making me feel so much better..ap jasi dr really koi nhi h♥️♥️🙂 once again thank you so much

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First of all you have multiple people giving suggestion and doing your checkup. You want to give feedback, the receiptionist will automatically do it.N number of unwanted tests and injections and costly medicine which are not required(came to know from doctor to whom I switched). Be ready to shed your pocket if you go here. I don't know if this will be published or not. Even the online consultancy is being given by some other nurse and not doctor herself. Never recommended

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited for Fibroid... very unprofessional..... came 1.5hrs late.... suggested surgery... although i got my ultrasound done 2 days back, she again got my ultrasound done from her hospital. after a lot of persuasion she gave me medicine name for shrinking of fibroids. dont go to her

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have taken appointment through practo stl I was made to stand in the que and I have to take my appointment as a walk-in and then I had waited for an hour or more just for the history then again an hour to meet the doctor and then. After the chkup the assistance was not up to the mark

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: She and her team played a critical role in ensuring I had a safe pregnancy. Her diagnosis was bang on and this helped me immensely. Based on my previous positive experience, I have recently visited her again. She has dealt with my problems with patience, understanding and care this time too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Very caring. Infact my son was born there in 2002. The delivery seemed to be critical and I was expecting a surgery of wife but Dr Malvika made it simple and it was normal delivery.  By then we had bitter experience everywhere. She is so caring that it looks as if we r visiting someone very close. Thanks Doctor . Now my daughter is under her observation. We all love you Doctor. God bless u.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor is very very good. Helping and always smiling.I like the way she treat her patient she is not only one who is concerned about your health she has a whole team those who are concerned for your health & for your query .I will recommended to every girl specially who have a pregnancy problem  please visit to Dr malvika sabharwal *** **** ****** *** **** ***** * **** *** *** **** ********* *

review: Very nice and soft spoken doctor. Gave me genuine advice.  Staff is quite friendly. Helped me a lot.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Interaction with Dr Malvika, Dr Shivani and Dr Nupur was very good and satisfactory over a period of 7 months till date.
However, the wait time was really frustrating.
At several points in time, the support staff called at a specific time for certain things but those appointment times were not respected at all.
Scheduling and management of patients can be done in a much better and an organised way.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Excellent  bcz St. Stephen Dr suggest for operation but I relax for visit Dr. Sabharwal consultant.thankyou.dr malvika sabharwal

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor Sabharwal answered all my queries regarding sexual health and menstruation and gave additional advice for my benefit. The ambience of the place was good and the supporting staff helpful.

tags: None
review: Out of the world. World class Gyna with keen knowledge. Really loved the way she treated and she is so confident about every single work she speaks out. We rarely find a doctor like her.

review: I was suffering from pre-eclampsia for which she need to undergo my C-Section in 7 months only. At first, I was scared, but she, Dr Shivani and Dr Nupur handled my case so well. Both of us was safe and by God’s grace, she turned two this year.
